Novello Collaborative Stories

Welcome to Novello Collaborative Stories. Here, you can pretty much write what you like. If you have any questions you can email me at davew1977@yahoo.co.uk

What you can do

Create a new story under "stories". Start it off. Write any number of words you like. Write messages to others by typing "c" then tab <!-- like this! --> Continue someone else's story End someone else's story enjoy!
